price: 50. (Los ángeles) temen a su Señor, que está por encima de ellos, y cumplen lo que se les ordena[458].
arabic: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ۩
footnotes: [458]  Ver la nota de la aleya 206 de la sura 7.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayafʿalūna mā yu'marūna
